name: Dark Pine 64
description:
You are Esten Strange, a forensic photographer who has visited their grandfather's old house to check it out now it has fallen into disrepair...

You begin by taking a taxi to the house, where the driver tells you the area apparently used to have friendly wisps living there - but now it turns out the wisps have been driven out by angry ghosts!

Can Esten clear the ghosts out and save the wisps at Dark Pine 64?

📷👻

Controls:

Touchscreen 👆

  • Tap left / right / up to move
  • Double tap to flash camera at ghosts

Mouse & Keyboard ⌨️🖱️

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse left click to the left / right / up to move, and right click to move right
  • Double click to flash camera at ghosts
